name: Osaka
description: Bustling and energetic, Osaka is a thriving metropolis with a distinct commercial culture and with a regional identity that sets it apart from elsewhere in Japan.

name: Paris
description: Paris rarely disappoints. Home to beautiful architecture, arresting art and the world’s finest restaurants, only the hard–hearted will leave the City of Light without falling in love.

name: Eilat
description: Sandwiched between the Red Sea and the mighty Negev desert, Eilat is a water sport and desert adventure paradise.
